name: Dead GroundZ
detailed_description:
Dead GroundZ is an action packed FPS VR game where gamers should unravel a conspiracy that has occurred on an isolated island

Players will encounter an amazing experience that they can only feel in a VR environment while solving a mystery of a huge conglomerate. This is done by collecting a variety of weapons to survive the attacks from numerous unidentified creatures.

Dead GroundZ supports movement via teleport by using the VR controller or direct movement by the player and comes with a variety of graphic settings to fit the needs for each player and provide a seamless immersive experience.

Features:
▪ A combination of mysterious events and extreme actions
▪ Fierce battles with the thrill of real life sensations
▪ The best graphic quality in VR gaming industry with the least chance of motion sickness
▪ An ultimate exciting experience with 20 weapons and striking effects
▪ A variety of different types of weapons, including realistic military weapons and grenade as well as exotic weapons such as freezing gun and gravity gun
▪ More than 30 different types of reactive NPCs
